en16931

Class BankInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • en16931.BankInfo

  • public class BankInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the bank information of an Entity. The Entity can play the role of buyer or seller, and this information will be used depending on the means of payment of each concrete transaction.
